name: 高等量子力學（二）
description: 本課程適合大學部高年級及碩博士班學生修習，主要在介紹量子力學的較高階原理、觀念、計算方法和應用，以作為進一步從事物理研究的準備。
goals: 瞭解相對論量子力學及基礎量子場論
syllabus:
1.     Week 1: Regularizations and  \\phi^4 theory I

2.     Week 2: Regularizations and  \\phi^4 theory II

3.     Week 3: QED I

4.     Week  4: QED II

5.     Week  5: Renormalization of Yang-Mills theories I

6.     Week 6: Renormalization of Yang-Mills theories II

7.     Week  7: Effective action I

8.     Week 8: Effective action II

9.   Week 9: Covariant Gaussian approximation I

10.  Week 10: Covariant Gaussian approximation II

11.   Week  11: Topological objects in field theories I

12.  Week 12:  Topological objects in field theories II

13.  Week 13: Finite temperature Quantum field theories

14.  Week 14: Schwinger Keldysh formalism I

15.  Week 15: Schwinger Keldysh formalism II

16.  Week 16: Reoprt I

17.  Week 17: Reoprt II
